title: How could I get a Riot Fist pump ward ?
body:
I am never going to meet any of you, my state as far as I know doesn't host you....

I couldn't go to anything anyways for a # a reasons...

Could some Red give me a chance to earn one?  If I knew how I'd try to :)

I've wanted  one for years...can I take a quiz or something ?

hahahaha ,  although I am serious in endeavor I really want a chance to get one :)

Thanks any who support me and Thanks anyone who down-votes me...Just tell me how I may ask better ;)

replies.body:
Hey there! ^-^ 

Wuks is right - we sometimes do have spare codes hanging around, and I just so happen to have one! I'd be willing to make a trade with you! How about a doodle of my favorite skin in the game - Arcade Sona? It can totally be an MS Paint drawing if you're not a crazy artist! :)
Do you happen to have any other codes? I enjoy collecting things, no matter what they are, and not having some sort of exclusive or pseudo-exclusive item just irks me in general.
Please, let her make a good deed without being greedy >_>
I'm sorry, I didn't really think of it like that. I just saw a possible chance and went for it. My bad.
if OP doesn't wanna deliver on art i'm totally looking for commission opportunities
They're still available; if you run into a Rioter in-game, (s)he might have a spare code that (s)he can give to you :p It is something that you'll have to earn though!

@ Riot KateyKhaos  I hope this is okay, I Tried :)  

http://imgur.com/a/PkvVO
Awww, she's adorable! I love it! ^-^ Thank you! I've added you on NA so I can give you a code!

> Hey there! ^-^

>Wuks is right - we sometimes do have spare codes hanging around, and I just so happen to have one! I'd be willing to make a trade with you! How about a doodle of my favorite skin in the game - Arcade Sona? It can totally be an MS Paint drawing if you're not a crazy artist! :)

You Awesome !  I'm okay drawing on paper but do my best:)

See you in a day or so!  I've had such a crappy 6 weeks or more with my Mom in and out of hospital and bro having a heart attack and surgery !  You both (all?) don't know how much this make my day!   I work on it. :) :) :)
Hey! Sorry to hear about your family! D: Hope everyone is doing better! I've gone ahead and added you on NA so I can give you the code! ^-^

> Riot KateyKhaos 

:) Thank You !

> Riot KateyKhaos 

Got the picture just don't know how to upload it ? 

Help anyone?  Thanks

>  It is something that you'll have to earn though!

How does one earn it hahaha   ?

> Wuks 

I'd hate to ask anyone who may or may not talk to me....I hate to ask any favors :) 

Friend me :)

> ahhh ive never seen that. I want one!

Good Luck with that ..I've wanted one since well,.. a long time can we @ a nice Rioter hahahaha   :)

> Fist Bump Ward
Receive a code for this ward skin by going to Pax East 2014
Copied from LoL wikia

does that code discount that a nice Rioter would give me one??hahaha
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/E2KO2AM72A0/maxresdefault.jpg
ahhh ive never seen that. I want one!

Help hahahaha   @RIOT help lol
